entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
